This is a great movie/documentary film. When it came out I was very young maybe around 13 or 14 years old but I understood the movie knew what was happening and even at that age I could not believe how the government was handling the situation and how other agency's were too. It's very sad to see all the people we lost famous and none famous all within the same years. Hands down a classic movie with a powerful message.
